rawamekayi rawa mul buddagamayi dan me lankawe pathurawanna yana buddagamayi dekakya kiyala thama pula hithanne.rawage storiya aththa.wena aagam walata wada sithime nidahasa patta widihata buddagame thiyenawa.eeth ada inna buddagame ayithikarayo kiyagena inna aya hasirena widiha meka ekka galapenawada?meka liyuwe ara awilila yana aagam yudde allala.pulasthita buddagame samahara poyints gana purasna thibunata ( filosofikal eewa) mul buddagame kiyala thiyana alpechcha widihata jiwath wena hamuduruwaru gana neme me wiwechane.meka fashan ekak koragaththa wena jathikayan thalanna pelanna kon karanna ee ayata thrasthawadin kona kapu ewun kiyala garahanna trayi korana thaman gana karana wiwechanayak wath iwasaganna bari ( gnyanananda himita atamassa karana wiwechanaya apahasayak neme.meka buddagame thiyana sithime nidahasa ekka therum ganna balamu.peramune ralala riakt korapu hati buddagamata koyitharam ekagada?
